title: Womens Metropolis Glove
description: Insulated glove features cozy insulation for warmth in winter weather. Durable nylon ripstop fabric at exterior.

title: Womens Power Stretch Glove
description: Made with a four-way stretch fabric that hugs your hands, these gloves are a very breathable, quick-drying material ideal to sport on cold weather runs, rides, or any similar aerobic activity. Designed to wick moisture away from your skin, drawing it towards the outside of the fabric where it rapidly evaporates, this wind and abrasion-resistant material keeps its wearer dry and comfortable in difficult conditions.

title: Womens Windstopper Ear Gear
description: A snug-fitting, comfortable ear protection band for use in extreme cold. Windproof shell fabric is slightly stretchy to ensure a secure fit.

title: Womens Beanie Hat
description: This attractive, wool-blend, beanie is ideal for cold days on or off the mountain. Interior micro-fleece ear band provides added warmth where you need it most.

title: Womens Running Hat
description: This ultra-lightweight running hat features mesh venting panels throughout head and a split-density bill to easily compress and tuck inside a pocket. Durable water repellent finish provides added weather-resistance without the weight.

title: Womens Khumbu Jacket
description: The Khumbu Jacket is Ideal to sport on cool to cold-weather journeys. Made with a durable, midweight TKA 300 fleece, this versatile fleece jacket offers protection for a range of activities.

title: Womens Alpine Project Jacket
description: Suited for swift, technical ascents where weight is critical, this ultra-lightweight hard shell provides extreme breathability with waterproof, windproof protection. This hard shell jacket provides extreme breathability and excellent next to skin comfort.

title: Womens Socializer LT Jacket
description: Ride the singletrack, or hike the fire road with this waterproof rain jacket. Casual, shirt styling features snaps at front panel and asymmetrical snap-down pocket at left chest. Fixed hood includes exterior cinches that fuel a precise fit around your cabeza. Ripstop fabric provides waterproof, breathable protection against wet weather without letting you overheat.

title: Womens Zephyrus Pullover
description: Lightweight and thermal without the bulk of cumbersome layers, this insulated wind shell pullover is extremely packable and versatile for a range of conditions.

title: Womens IndyLite Jacket
description: A mountain biker's best friend when the weather unexpectedly turns nasty, this water-resistant jacket will impress you with its numerous features. Mesh side panels and a cape vent release heat as you warm up on your ride.

title: Womens Bella Luna Down Vest
description: Insulate yourself against cold conditions in the backcountry or around your own base camp with this vest. Extended collar protects your face from harsh exposure and is lined with a soft chin guard to eliminate discomfort caused by zippers rubbing against your skin.

title: Womens Redpoint Vest
description: A sleeveless version of the hardcore favorite jacket, the Redpoint Vest delivers unparalleled warmth suitable for everyday wear and tear. With synthetic insulation, its lightweight and water-resistant features permit outdoor athletes to stay dry and comfortable all winter long.

title: Womens Yoga Pants
description: Sleek running pant designed with stretch elastane and double knit fabric for warmth and mobility.

title: Womens Paramount Peak Convertible Pants
description: Convertible pant with large pocket space and durability. Pant legs unzip at knees, morphing into shorts, creating the ultimate transitional hiking pant/short combination. Elastic waistband at back with webbed belt included. Made with midweight nylon fabric.

title: Womens Leggins
description: New midweight cotton-stretch legging delivers comfort and mobility while traveling. Hidden pocket at waistband provides secure stash spot. Pairs well with long sweaters.

title: Womens Tadasana Pants
description: Super versatile four-way stretch yoga pant is ready to bust out into downward facing dog or firefly pose. Stretch fabric provides ease of movement that's soft against skin for luxe comfort. Waistband rests about 2 inches below navel. Namaste.

title: Womens Venture Pants
description: Technical waterproof, breathable rainwear pant designed to thrive in the wettest of weather. An elastic waist features a drawstring for a comfortable, secure fit. Extremely packable, this all-purpose weatherproof pant rolls up and stashes in its own pocket for easy traveling.

title: Womens Freedom Insulated Pants
description: Stylie pant designed with waterproof, breathable, fully seam sealed fabric on the exterior, coupled with thermal insulation for optimal warmth at 13,000-feet. Low-rise boot cut is the most flared style available, with a neutral fit around the waist, and athletic fit around the knees with a flared bottom.

title: Womens Robertson Shorts
description: These soft, lightweight shorts will help you create your own legends on the trail. Crafted from 100% cotton canvas, these comfortable and durable bottoms are ideal for use in warmer climates. Feature triple needle stitching for durability and an internal drawcord for a custom fit.

title: Womens Running Shorts
description: Durable, lightweight, running short features breathable mesh panels at sides to aid with moisture management, and interior knit liner for comfort on long runs. Interior fold-over pocket accommodates petite items with additional zip pocket at back for secure storage.

title: Womens Hoodie
description: Pull on the warmth during cool hikes or post-run workouts with this new fleece pullover hoodie. Made from silky microvelour fleece, this lightweight hoodie provides warmth without the bulk.

title: Womens Masonic Zip Hoodie
description: Perfect for hiking, climbing, or walking around town, this fitted fleece hoodie provides comfort and warmth. Crafted from a special fabric with less weight and bulk than traditional insulating materials, this quick-drying, breathable layer features raglan sleeves for increased comfort when carrying a backpack.

title: Womens Long Sleeve Tee
description: Hit the gym, road, or trail with this classic athletic-cut long-sleeve tee for comfortable use. Super soft stretch-cotton fabric feels smooth against skin, and promotes unrestricted movement. Backpack-friendly raglan sleeves permit comfortable pack-carry without irritating seams gouching into shoulders and back.

title: Womens VNeck
description: Ideal for fast hikes and multi-day backpacking trips, this new lightweight layering top features the revolutionary technology that dramatically improves dry time and increases breathability in a way wicking technology never has.

title: Womens CrewNeck
description: Insanely lightweight running short-sleeve shirt is designed with moisture-wicking fabric, stitchless seams, and burn-out ventilation on the back to provide optimum breathability and comfort on long runs.

title: Womens Short Sleeve Tee
description: Hit the gym, road, or trail with this classic athletic-cut short-sleeve tee for comfortable use. Super soft stretch-cotton fabric feels smooth against skin, and promotes unrestricted movement. Backpack-friendly raglan sleeves permit comfortable pack-carry without irritating seams gouching into shoulders and back.

title: Womens Sport Tank
description: Strike a warrior or plow pose with ease in this yoga-specific tank. ShapeShifter fabric provides support and a shape-enhancing fit with internal sport bra construction and sleek racerback design.

title: Womens Wrap Tunic
description: Wrap yourself in goodness after a solid yoga session with this new cozy hooded tunic. Longer-length and asymmetrical-zip design provides an ideal getaway to cover up in after practice.

title: Womens Doubletrack Shoe
description: Want a cushioned, stable trail running shoe that doesn't feel like a brick? The nimble Double-Track with X-Dome_ Cradle Support corrects your overpronation without you even realizing it, freeing up your attention to focus to enjoy your run.

title: Womens Running Shoe
description: These ideal trail running shoes will help you tackle wet, unforgiving paths. Made with waterproof, breathable membrane, this runner offers comfort, support and traction. With a motion-control platform, these shoes provide support and stability to low arches.

title: Womens Hiking Boot
description: Made for alpine starts and fast-and-light ascents, this new lightweight, mid-cut day hiking boot provides maximum agility and responsiveness with a waterproof, breathable, and a grippy, durable rubber outsole.

title: Womens Sandle
description: Almost like sandals, these amphibious performance shoes have a back strap for easy on and off. The upper is made of quick-drying stretch mesh and waterproof leather. These shoes allow you to move through water effortlessly as the outsole grips the ground. They feature our quick-pull lace lock system, ensuring a secure fit.

title: Womens Midweight Running Socks
description: Reach your running Zen in these durable three-season socks. Featuring toe and heel construction for blister prevention, theyíÈre designed for comfort thanks to pressure point, instep and outsole cushioning.

title: Womens Lightweight Hiking Socks
description: New lightweight hiking sock is ideal for treks in mild to warm weather. Fiber blend deliver comfort and wicking management crucial for hikes in warm conditions, with cushioning at major pressure points and outsole to help prevent blisters.
